properties.dmlInsert: INSERT INTO "ITSOWNER"."TBL_RAMP_LIGHT" ("UID", "DEVICE_ID", "DEVICE_NAM", "LINK_ID", "DEVICE_CTRL_ID", "DESCRIPTION", "DEVICE_TP", "LOCATION", "DEVICE_CTRL_IP", "INSTALL_PHASE", "MANU_ID", "CTRL_STATUS", "CREATE_DT", "CREATE_BY", "UPDATE_DT", "UPDATE_BY", "VERSION", "ERROR_CODE", "LIGHT_STATUS", "SHAPE", "ERROR_MSG", "RCV_ERROR_CODE", "RCV_ERROR_MSG", "AVAILABLE") VALUES (sys_guid(), '${DEVICE_ID}', '${DEVICE_NAM}', '${LINK_ID}', '${DEVICE_CTRL_ID}', '${DESCRIPTION}', '${DEVICE_TP}', '${LOCATION}', '${DEVICE_CTRL_IP}', '2', NULL, '0', sysdate, '${CREATE_BY}', sysdate, '${UPDATE_BY}', '1', NULL, '1', ${SHAPE}, NULL, '0', '正常', '0');
